attributes.action: Impose legislation to make scooters quieter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How annoying is it when all you can hear is a high pitch scream from a Scooter being revved to within an inch of its life by a young rider? This petition is intended to highlight the problem so that mufflers must be fitted to these annoying and anti-social, Chav mobiles.
